  parameters={[{"name":"scope","in":"path","description":"Scope of the document box","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","description":"Valid document box scope string, must be: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, ':', '-', '_', '.'","examples":["user:1:files"],"title":"DocumentBoxScope"}},{"name":"x-tenant-id","in":"header","description":"ID of the tenant you are targeting","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"x-tenant-env","in":"header","description":"Environment of the tenant you are targeting","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
